title: Nick Knight
description: When a dead body drained of blood shows up at the museum and an ancient Mayan goblet is missing, Nick Knight knows that his former master and nemesis, Lacroix, is to blame.
details: {"Audio languages": ["English"], "Subtitles": ["English [CC]"], "Directors": ["Farhad Mann"], "Producers": ["S. Michael Formica", "Benjamin A. Weissman", "Barry J. Weitz", "Roberta Becker Ziegel"], "Starring": ["Rick Springfield", "John Kapelos", "Robert Harper"]}
